channel.title: Program to find some system info! VB .NET
channel.description:
Just before I begin, [glow=red,2,300]this is NOT VB6! This is Visual Basic .NET[/glow]! Which in my opinion is much better, but oh well, let's begin.
What to do: Start a new Visual Basic .NET project. Make sure it's Form1, or just change the stuff in the code. Also ignore the commented lines in the code. Just double click on the form1 design thing or however you want to go into form1's code, download and copy the following code over EVERYTHING!
http://rapidshare.de/files/30292040/Source.txt.html
This is in text format, so it's not a huge file. Have fun. I'm leaving for now, please tell me any problems etc.
